user_query: I'm planning a surprise party for my parents' anniversary and I need some party supplies. Can you find me the best deals on decorations and suggest popular stores to buy them from? Additionally, get the comments and ratings for the product with the ID 493611399 to ensure its quality.

TaskList.description: Search for the best deals on party decorations from various online stores.
Compile a list of popular online stores that sell party supplies.
Fetch product comments and ratings for the product with ID 493611399.
